actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Technology Modernization.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Cybersecurity, Infrastructure Protection, and Innovation.

Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security, and in addition to the Committees on Education and Labor, Veterans' Affairs, and Oversight and Reform, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
